status.info: We have been regularly using this method for decades.

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"18qtf","text":"Add   Digsol buffer (see Materials for recipe) and     to a lablelled 1.5ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"di5il","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"6A438280091011EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"AA12CE70091011EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"4104D1BA341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Proteinase K, 2mL","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"19131","stats":{"total_protocols":9},"url":"","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","name":"Qiagen"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"q1tt","text":"Tissue: Cut into small pieces (\u003c1cm2) with a sterile razor blade on a sterile glass plate before adding to the 1.5mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7},{"style":"sup","offset":35,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c651j","text":"Blood: Centrifuge blood sample at 13,000rpm for about 1 min (to pellet sample).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d3g0","text":"Remove sample from ethanol with toothpick and blot onto tissue. When almost dry, transfer the toothpick into the 1.5mL tube and jiggle to dislodge the blood. Remove toothpick and place in disinfectant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehvkl","text":"Swab: Dry of ethanol and place into the 1.5mL tube. Snap off the end of the swap so the lid may close.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eddea","text":"Feather: Cut the calamus of 1-3 feathers into small pieces with a sterile razor blade on a sterile glass plate before adding to the tube. If feathers are very small and blood spots are present on the tips, feathers can be added whole.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3t7i6","text":"Hair: Place hair(s) into the 1.5mL tube preferably with the largest root and add     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":81,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":83,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cqb60","text":"Insect: Degut and add to 1.5mL tube. If the insect is very small, starve for 48hrs before freezing. Add    . Crush with a pestle or add a metal lysing bead and place on TissueLyser (Qiagen) for 2min, 30/s. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":104,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":106,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"jcuv","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32ob9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"8547F3C0092111EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"43701884341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"1M DTT","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"43816","stats":{"total_protocols":1},"url":null,"vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","name":"Merck MilliporeSigma (Sigma-Aldrich)"}}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"551E4FA609CC11EEB4710A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","can_edit":0,"cas_number":"","entries":null,"error":false,"guid":"43701884341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","label":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"1M DTT","public":1,"rrid":"","scientificNotation":false,"sku":"43816","unit":1,"url":"","vendor":{"id":17,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","name":"Merck MilliporeSigma (Sigma-Aldrich)"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2e6i","text":"Vortex and place samples in a rotating oven at   for   or   for maximum digestion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ef9v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"735B1B40092311EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10800,"guid":"7A3DF450092311EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"A724DBA0092311EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ahju","text":"Vortex several times over a period of at least   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5erar","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"5A0650A0092411EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"63D0E050092411EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eh7lc","text":"Aspirate the supernatant (clear liquid containing the DNA) into a new labelled 1.5ml tube. Discard tube containing the pelleted protein debris.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ne6c","text":"Add   100% ethanol and invert the tube gently several times to precipitate DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dhc5v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"FE69C000092411EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"adoe4","text":"Pour off ethanol in a smooth motion, taking care not to lose the DNA pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dgk1u","text":"Add   70% ethanol and invert gently several times to clean the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4916h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"747EC8D0092511EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rs0h","text":"Pour off ethanol in a smooth movement or using a pipette gently draw off the supernatant if fear of losing the pellet. Stand tubes upside-down on clean tissue until dry (approx. 30-60 minutes). This can be sped up by using the heat of a lamp from above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":178,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d81be","text":"Once fully dry add approx.   Low TE (see Materials for recipe). Add less if a very tiny pellet or no pellet is observed. Flick sample to dislodge pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5t3lr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"178196C0092611EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bj6vn","text":"Place tubes in a thermomixer or shaking oven at    for   to dissolve the pellet. If the pellet has not completely dissolved add more Low TE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3uobs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"437E4520092611EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"50","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"49097D70092611EE8759D313A2C95A95","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"6j2a4","text":"Use GLP and wear protective equipment. Avoid contact with skin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8orhv","text":"All chemicals can be disposed of down the sink with copious amounts of water to dilute the ethanol down to \u003e20% of the waste.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m93o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bp99","text":"If inhaled: If unconscious, place in recovery position and seek medical advice. Keep the respiratory tract clear. If symptoms persist, call a physician.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vh9h","text":"In case of skin contact: Wash off immediately with soap and plenty of water while removing all contaminated clothes and shoes. If symptoms persist, call a physician.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eb6li","text":"In case of eye contact: Remove contact lenses. Protect unharmed eye. Rinse thoroughly with plenty of water for at least 15 minutes and consult a physician.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4v4pp","text":"If swallowed: If accidentally swallowed, obtain immediate medical attention. Rinse mouth with water. Never give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a71d1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
